summary: A small program to fix a problem with the pluginmanager, which have sometimes problems with new installed plugins.
descriptionHtml:
If you install a plugin with a .esp file, it can happen that the pluginmanager does not display the mod. In this case you can write it manually in the plugins.txt, but if you make a mistake, problems could be the consequence. The tool make this automatically, with no problems.

PLEASE READ THE README.TXT BEFORE USING!
author: TheModder22
